Eaglemoss Collections Passione Rally #115 Hyundai i20 2014 Rallye Deutschland Winner T. Neuville/N. Gilsoul

Purchased 2015

First WRC win for Thierry Neuville.
First WRC win for Hyundai.
Only WRC win for i20 (1st gen).

Hyundai returned to the WRC in 2014 with the i20 after a 10 year "break" from the series. Hyundai's first foray in the WRC was over a 4-year period from 2000 to 2003 and their best result was 4th place finishes in 2000 & 2001. On the 9th event of the i20's first season Hyundai got their first 1-2 WRC finish at hands of Thierry Neuville and Dani Sordo in Germany.

The Hyundais performed well and were in the top 10 from start but luck played a part in the win. Jari-Matti Latvala (VW) held the lead from day 1 of the event but crashed out in stage 15 on day 3 handing the lead to Kris Meeke (Citroën). Meeke then crashed out in stage 16 handing the lead to Neuville.
